entries.cnode_1: Ignore the survey device and continue working.
entries.cnode_2: Focus the device on the concentration.
entries.cnode_d: As you work, your survey device beeps and chatters.  You look down to find that it has discovered a nearby node of concentrated resources.
entries.critical_success: You successfully recover a particularly rich sample!
entries.density_below_threshold: Locating a viable sample of %TO here seems a bit beyond your skill.
entries.effects_of_radiation_sickness: You feel the effects of radiation sickness.
entries.efficiency_too_low: %TO's resource density is too low to locate a sample here.
entries.gamble_fail: You weren't able to recover the full concentration of resources.
entries.gamble_no_action: You don't have enough action points to recover the concentration.
entries.gamble_success: You successfully recover the concentration of resources!
entries.gnode_1: Ignore the concentration and continue working.
entries.gnode_2: Attempt to recover the resources. (2000 Action)
entries.gnode_d: It appears you have found a previously undetected concentration of resource.  An initial inspection indicates the cache is of high quality, but it looks like it may be difficult to get to.
entries.must_have_harvester: You are unable to gather energy resources with a survey tool, and will need to place a generator here to take advantage of any available at this location.
entries.no_inv_space: You don't have enough inventory space to carry the samples you found.
entries.node_not_close: You weren't close enough to the concentration to recover it.
entries.node_recovery: You successfully recover a particularly rich concentration of resource!
entries.node_waypoint: A waypoint to the concentration has been added to your datapad.
entries.radioactive_sample_d: Sampling a radioactive mineral will result in harmful effects. Are you sure you wish to continue?
entries.radioactive_sample_known: You have chosen to override safety measures and may now sample
entries.radioactive_sample_unknown: You have chosen to override safety measures and may now sample the chosen radioactive.
entries.sample_cancel_attack: You can't take samples while under attack!
entries.sample_empty: You are unable to find any more samples in the immediate area.
entries.sample_failed: You failed to locate a sample of %TO.
entries.sample_gone: Sampling process aborted because the sampling tool is no longer in your inventory.
entries.sample_located: You successfully locate a %DI unit sample of %TO.
entries.sample_select_type: Select the type of resource you wish to sample.
entries.sample_survey: You can't take resource samples while you are surveying.
entries.select_range: Select the desired range to resolution ratio.
entries.survey_sample: You can't take a survey while you are collecting samples.
entries.survey_waypoint: A waypoint to the highest detected concentration of the resource has been activated.
entries.tool_recharge_time: You will be able to sample again in %DI seconds.
entries.trace_amount: You are only able to locate trace amounts of %TO.
entries.wrong_tool: %TO resources cannot be located with this tool.
entries.no_survey_in_water: You can't survey while in water.
entries.cnode_collection: Attempt to have your pet gather additional resources at the node.
entries.gnode_collection: Search the area for a high purity sample. (2000 Action)
entries.pet_search_success: Your pet succeeds in locating additional resources.
entries.pet_search_fail: Your pet fails to locate additional resources.
entries.gamble_rare: You locate a tiny sample of an extremely high purity.
